ctl:test.name: wcseo:DescribeEOCoverageSet
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Test EO-WCS GetCapabilities.

ctl:test.name: wcseo:req47
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req47:

ctl:test.name: wcseo:get-kvp-req47
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req47:A DescribeEOCoverageSet request shall consist of a structure as defined in Figure 8 and Table 9.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription request, and the result should not contain an ows:ExceptionReport.
[FAILURE] Send an invalid EOCoverageSetDescription request, and the result should contain an ows:ExceptionReport.

ctl:test.name: wcseo:soap-req47
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req47:A DescribeEOCoverageSet request shall consist of a structure as defined in Figure 8 and Table 9.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription request, and the result should not contain an ows:ExceptionReport.

ctl:test.name: wcseo:req48
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req48:

ctl:test.name: wcseo:get-kvp-req48
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req48:If a DescribeEOCoverageSet request contains a sections element then this element shall contain values one of the values CoverageDescriptions, DatasetSeriesDescriptions or All..

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription request with parameter Sections=CoverageDescriptions, and the result should not contain an ows:ExceptionReport.
[FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription request with parameter Sections=DatasetSeriesDescriptions, and the result should not contain an ows:ExceptionReport.
[FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription request with parameter Sections=All, and the result should not contain an ows:ExceptionReport.
[FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription request with parameter Sections=InvalidSections, and the result should contain an ows:ExceptionReport.

ctl:test.name: wcseo:soap-req48
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req48:If a DescribeEOCoverageSet request contains a sections element then this element shall contain values one of the values CoverageDescriptions, DatasetSeriesDescriptions or All..

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription request with parameter Sections=CoverageDescriptions, and the result should not contain an ows:ExceptionReport.
[FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription request with parameter Sections=DatasetSeriesDescriptions, and the result should not contain an ows:ExceptionReport.
[FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription request with parameter Sections=All, and the result should not contain an ows:ExceptionReport.
[FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription request with parameter Sections=InvalidSections, and the result should contain an ows:ExceptionReport.

ctl:test.name: wcseo:req49
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req49:

ctl:test.name: wcseo:get-kvp-req49
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req49:The eoId parameter value in a DescribeEOCoverageSet request shall be equal to the identifier of a Dataset, a Stitched Mosaic, or a Dataset Series offered by the server addressed.

xsl:when.ctl:message: [MESSAGE] the GetCapabilities response does not contain a WCSEO::DatasetSeriesSummary section.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] The eoId parameter value in the DescribeEOCoverageSet request is not equal to the identified DatasetSeriesId.

xsl:when.ctl:message: [MESSAGE] the GetCapabilities response does not contain a CoverageSummary.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] The eoId parameter value in the DescribeEOCoverageSet request is not equal to the identified CoverageId.

ctl:test.name: wcseo:soap-req49
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req49:The eoId parameter value in a DescribeEOCoverageSet request shall be equal to the identifier of a Dataset, a Stitched Mosaic, or a Dataset Series offered by the server addressed.

xsl:when.ctl:message: [MESSAGE] the GetCapabilities response does not contain a WCSEO::DatasetSeriesSummary section.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] The eoId parameter value in the DescribeEOCoverageSet request is not equal to the identified DatasetSeriesId.

xsl:when.ctl:message: [MESSAGE] the GetCapabilities response does not contain a CoverageSummary.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] The eoId parameter value in the DescribeEOCoverageSet request is not equal to the identified CoverageId.

ctl:test.name: wcseo:req50
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req50:

ctl:test.name: wcseo:get-kvp-req50
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req50:If a DescribeEOCoverageSet request contains a containment parameter then this parameter shall have one of the values contains or overlaps.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription request with parameter containment=CONTAINS, and the result should not contain an ows:ExceptionReport.
[FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription request with parameter containment=OVERLAPS, and the result should not contain an ows:ExceptionReport.
[FAILURE] Send a EOCoverageSetDescription request with invalid containment parameter, and the result should contain an ows:ExceptionReport.

ctl:test.name: wcseo:soap-req50
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req50:If a DescribeEOCoverageSet request contains a containment parameter then this parameter shall have one of the values contains or overlaps.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription request with parameter containment=CONTAINS, and the result should not contain an ows:ExceptionReport.
[FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription request with parameter containment=OVERLAPS, and the result should not contain an ows:ExceptionReport.
[FAILURE] Send a EOCoverageSetDescription request with invalid containment parameter, and the result should contain an ows:ExceptionReport.

ctl:test.name: wcseo:req51
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req51:

ctl:test.name: wcseo:get-kvp-req51
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req51:If a DescribeEOCoverageSet request contains dimensionTrim elements with dimension parameters then each such dimension parameter shall have one of the values Lat, Long or "phenomenonTime", Each of these values shall appear at most once in a given request.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription subset request which contains no duplicate dimension parameters, and the result should not contain an ows:ExceptionReport.
[FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription subset request which contains no duplicate dimension parameters, and the result should not contain an ows:ExceptionReport.
[FAILURE] Send a EOCoverageSetDescription subset request which contains duplicate dimension parameters, and the result should contain an ows:ExceptionReport.

ctl:test.name: wcseo:soap-req51
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req51:If a DescribeEOCoverageSet request contains dimensionTrim elements with dimension parameters then each such dimension parameter shall have one of the values Lat, Long or "phenomenonTime", Each of these values shall appear at most once in a given request.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription subset request which contains no duplicate dimension parameters, and the result should not contain an ows:ExceptionReport.
[FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription subset request which contains no duplicate dimension parameters, and the result should not contain an ows:ExceptionReport.
[FAILURE] Send a EOCoverageSetDescription subset request which contains duplicate dimension parameters, and the result should contain an ows:ExceptionReport.

ctl:test.name: wcseo:req52
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req52:

ctl:test.name: wcseo:get-kvp-req52
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req52:A DescribeEOCoverageSet request shall use WGS84 [4] as spatial and ISO 8601 [2] as temporal CRS for the coordinates in trim requests.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription request, and the result should not contain an ows:ExceptionReport.

ctl:test.name: wcseo:soap-req52
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req52:A DescribeEOCoverageSet request shall use WGS84 [4] as spatial and ISO 8601 [2] as temporal CRS for the coordinates in trim requests.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription request, and the result should not contain an ows:ExceptionReport.

ctl:test.name: wcseo:req53
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req53:

ctl:test.name: wcseo:get-kvp-req53
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req53:The response to a successful DescribeEOCoverageSet request shall consist of a WCSEO::EOCoverageSetDescription structure.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription request, and the result should contain an EOCoverageSetDescription.

ctl:test.name: wcseo:soap-req53
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req53:The response to a successful DescribeEOCoverageSet request shall consist of a WCSEO::EOCoverageSetDescription structure.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription request, and the result should contain an EOCoverageSetDescription.

ctl:test.name: wcseo:req54
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req54:

ctl:test.name: wcseo:get-kvp-req54
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req54:Each WCS::CoverageDescription listed in the response to a successful DescribeEOCoverageSet request shall contain one WCSEO::EOMetadata element containing the EO Metadata component of the EO Coverage to be described.

xsl:when.ctl:message: [MESSAGE] the GetCapabilities response does not contain a CoverageSummary.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] A successful DescribeEOCoverageSet request on should contain a EOMetadata.

ctl:test.name: wcseo:soap-req54
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req54:Each WCS::CoverageDescription listed in the response to a successful DescribeEOCoverageSet request shall contain one WCSEO::EOMetadata element containing the EO Metadata component of the EO Coverage to be described.

xsl:when.ctl:message: [MESSAGE] the GetCapabilities response does not contain a CoverageSummary.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] A successful DescribeEOCoverageSet request on should contain a EOMetadata.

ctl:test.name: wcseo:req55
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req55:

ctl:test.name: wcseo:get-kvp-req55
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req55:If a DescribeEOCoverageSet request contains a sections parameter then a successful response shall contain a wcs:CoverageDescriptions element if and only if the section parameter list contains one of the values CoverageDescriptions or All.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription request with parameter Sections=CoverageDescriptions, and the result should contain an CoverageDescriptions.
[FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription request with parameter Sections=All, and the result should not contain an CoverageDescriptions.
[FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription request with parameter Sections=InvalidSections, and the result should contain an ows:ExceptionReport.

ctl:test.name: wcseo:soap-req55
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req55:If a DescribeEOCoverageSet request contains a sections parameter then a successful response shall contain a wcs:CoverageDescriptions element if and only if the section parameter list contains one of the values CoverageDescriptions or All.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription request with parameter Sections=CoverageDescriptions, and the result should contain an CoverageDescriptions.
[FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription request with parameter Sections=All, and the result should not contain an CoverageDescriptions.
[FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription request with parameter Sections=InvalidSections, and the result should contain an ows:ExceptionReport.

ctl:test.name: wcseo:req56
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req56:

ctl:test.name: wcseo:get-kvp-req56
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req56:If a DescribeEOCoverageSet request contains a sections parameter then a successful response shall contain a wcseo:DatasetSeriesDescriptions element if and only if the section parameter list contains one of the values DatasetSeriesDescriptions or All.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription request with parameter Sections=DatasetSeriesDescriptions, and the result should contain an DatasetSeriesDescriptions.
[FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription request with parameter Sections=All, and the result should contain an DatasetSeriesDescriptions.
[FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription request with parameter Sections=InvalidSections, and the result should contain an ows:ExceptionReport.

ctl:test.name: wcseo:soap-req56
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req56:If a DescribeEOCoverageSet request contains a sections parameter then a successful response shall contain a wcseo:DatasetSeriesDescriptions element if and only if the section parameter list contains one of the values DatasetSeriesDescriptions or All.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription request with parameter Sections=DatasetSeriesDescriptions, and the result should contain an DatasetSeriesDescriptions.
[FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription request with parameter Sections=All, and the result should contain an DatasetSeriesDescriptions.
[FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription request with parameter Sections=InvalidSections, and the result should contain an ows:ExceptionReport.

ctl:test.name: wcseo:req57-58
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req57:

ctl:test.name: wcseo:get-kvp-req57-58
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: test req57-58

xsl:when.ctl:message: [MESSAGE] the GetCapabilities response does not contain a CoverageSummary.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] The identified CoverageId appears more than once.

ctl:test.name: wcseo:soap-req57-58
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: test req57-58

xsl:when.ctl:message: [MESSAGE] the GetCapabilities response does not contain a CoverageSummary.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] The identified CoverageId appears more than once.

ctl:test.name: wcseo:req59
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req59:

ctl:test.name: wcseo:get-kvp-req59
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req59:/req/eowcs/describeEOCoverageSet response containment:The response to a successful DescribeEOCoverageSet request containing a wcs:CoverageDescription section shall contain only descriptions of those EO Coverages whose spatial footprint defined by its eop:EarthObservation/om:featureOfInterest/eop:Foot-print overlaps with the spatial request extent, in case request parameter containment is of value overlaps or is omitted, is completely contained within the spatial request extent, in case request parameter containment is of value contains where by all spatial coordinates are expressed in WGS84 [2].

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription subset request, and the result should not contain an ows:ExceptionReport.

[FAILURE] /req/eowcs/describeEOCoverageSet response containment:The response to a successful DescribeEOCoverageSet request containing a wcs:CoverageDescription section shoud contain only descriptions of those EO Coverages whose spatial footprint defined by its eop:EarthObservation/om:featureOfInterest/eop:Foot-print is completely contained within the spatial request extent, in case request parameter containment is of value contains where by all spatial coordinates are expressed in WGS84 [2].

[FAILURE] /req/eowcs/describeEOCoverageSet response containment:The response to a successful DescribeEOCoverageSet request containing a wcs:CoverageDescription section shoud contain only descriptions of those EO Coverages whose spatial footprint defined by its eop:EarthObservation/om:featureOfInterest/eop:Foot-print is completely contained within the spatial request extent, in case request parameter containment is of value contains where by all spatial coordinates are expressed in WGS84 [2].

ctl:test.name: wcseo:soap-req59
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req59:/req/eowcs/describeEOCoverageSet response containment:The response to a successful DescribeEOCoverageSet request containing a wcs:CoverageDescription section shall contain only descriptions of those EO Coverages whose spatial footprint defined by its eop:EarthObservation/om:featureOfInterest/eop:Foot-print overlaps with the spatial request extent, in case request parameter containment is of value overlaps or is omitted, is completely contained within the spatial request extent, in case request parameter containment is of value contains where by all spatial coordinates are expressed in WGS84 [2].

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription subset request, and the result should not contain an ows:ExceptionReport.

[FAILURE] /req/eowcs/describeEOCoverageSet response containment:The response to a successful DescribeEOCoverageSet request containing a wcs:CoverageDescription section shoud contain only descriptions of those EO Coverages whose spatial footprint defined by its eop:EarthObservation/om:featureOfInterest/eop:Foot-print is completely contained within the spatial request extent, in case request parameter containment is of value contains where by all spatial coordinates are expressed in WGS84 [2].

[FAILURE] /req/eowcs/describeEOCoverageSet response containment:The response to a successful DescribeEOCoverageSet request containing a wcs:CoverageDescription section shoud contain only descriptions of those EO Coverages whose spatial footprint defined by its eop:EarthObservation/om:featureOfInterest/eop:Foot-print is completely contained within the spatial request extent, in case request parameter containment is of value contains where by all spatial coordinates are expressed in WGS84 [2].

ctl:test.name: wcseo:req60
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req60:

ctl:test.name: wcseo:get-kvp-req60
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req60:The response to a successful DescribeEOCoverageSet request containing a wcs:CoverageDescription section shall contain only descriptions of EO Coverages whose time interval defined by its eop:Earth-Observation/om:phenomenon-Time/gml:TimePeriod/gml:beginPosition and eop:EarthObservation/om:phenomenonTime/gml:TimePeriod/gml:endPosition elements in wcseo:EOMetadata overlaps with the request time extent, in case request parameter containment is of value overlaps or is omitted, is completely contained within the request time extent, in case request parameter containment is of value contains,whereby all temporal coordinates are expressed in ISO 8601 [2].

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription subset request, and the result should not contain an ows:ExceptionReport.

[FAILURE] The response to a successful DescribeEOCoverageSet request containing a wcs:CoverageDescription section should contain only descriptions of EO Coverages whose time interval defined by its eop:EarthObservation/om:phenomenon-Time/gml:TimePeriod/gml:beginPosition and eop:EarthObservation/om:phenomenonTime/gml:TimePeriod/gml:endPosition elements in wcseo:EOMetadata is completely contained within the request time extent, in case request parameter containment is of value contains,whereby all temporal coordinates are expressed in ISO 8601 [2]

ctl:test.name: wcseo:soap-req60
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req60:The response to a successful DescribeEOCoverageSet request containing a wcs:CoverageDescription section shall contain only descriptions of EO Coverages whose time interval defined by its eop:Earth-Observation/om:phenomenon-Time/gml:TimePeriod/gml:beginPosition and eop:EarthObservation/om:phenomenonTime/gml:TimePeriod/gml:endPosition elements in wcseo:EOMetadata overlaps with the request time extent, in case request parameter containment is of value overlaps or is omitted, is completely contained within the request time extent, in case request parameter containment is of value contains,whereby all temporal coordinates are expressed in ISO 8601 [2].

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription subset request, and the result should not contain an ows:ExceptionReport.

[FAILURE] The response to a successful DescribeEOCoverageSet request containing a wcs:CoverageDescription section should contain only descriptions of EO Coverages whose time interval defined by its eop:EarthObservation/om:phenomenon-Time/gml:TimePeriod/gml:beginPosition and eop:EarthObservation/om:phenomenonTime/gml:TimePeriod/gml:endPosition elements in wcseo:EOMetadata is completely contained within the request time extent, in case request parameter containment is of value contains,whereby all temporal coordinates are expressed in ISO 8601 [2]

ctl:test.name: wcseo:req61
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req61:

ctl:test.name: wcseo:get-kvp-req61
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req61:In a DescribeEOCoverageSet request, a trim specification omitted shall be interpreted as the actual boundary of the objects requested in the axis omitted.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription subset request, and the result should not contain an ows:ExceptionReport.
[FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription subset request, and the result should not contain an ows:ExceptionReport.

ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req61:

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription subset request, and the result should not contain an ows:ExceptionReport.
[FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription subset request, and the result should not contain an ows:ExceptionReport.

ctl:test.name: wcseo:req62
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req62:

ctl:test.name: wcseo:get-kvp-req62
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req62:In a DescribeEOCoverageSet request, a lower or upper bound omitted shall be interpreted as indicating the actual lower or upper bound of the objects requested in the axis omitted.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription subset request, and the result should not contain an ows:ExceptionReport.

ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req62:In a DescribeEOCoverageSet request, a lower or upper bound omitted shall be interpreted as indicating the actual lower or upper bound of the objects requested in the axis omitted.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] Send a valid EOCoverageSetDescription subset request, and the result should not contain an ows:ExceptionReport.

ctl:test.name: wcseo:req63-66
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req63:

ctl:test.name: wcseo:get-kvp-req63-66
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: test req63-66.

xsl:when.ctl:message: [MESSAGE] the GetCapabilities response does not contain a CoverageSummary section.

xsl:if.ctl:message: [FAILURE] The CoverageSubtype of is unknown

[FAILURE] The response to a successful DescribeEOCoverageSet request shall report in its number-Returned attribute the sum of all CoverageDescription and DatasetSeriesDescription elements included in the response
[FAILURE] The number-Returned shall be less than the number-matched

ctl:test.ctl:assertion: test req63-66

xsl:when.ctl:message: [MESSAGE] the GetCapabilities response does not contain a CoverageSummary section.
